Perceptor:

"Be ready for a treacherous encounter"said dryly Perceptor"niether when you 
defeat him gives him your back, or the same Prime tragedy will happen..."and 
looking to Staton and legacy " We should decrease her energy levels... in 
that way she couldnt try to escape or fight when we need her awake,  Prepare 
the insolation of her memories and start deleting the programs"


"What are you planing to do?"said Kup

"We will do exactly what I did, with her memories contained and the progams 
deleted, we will use a little of manipulation to tend to our favor her 
spirit, it's when Rodimus will take the main role... Speaking about, when 
Tucson release that energie before being captured in the intrusion to 
BlackFortress, What was your Reaction Rodimus and what was Nighltight's?"

The predacon program stated to show more agressive and dominant than 
Maximal's and it gain more control of Nightlight's spark.


-----Original Message----- 
From: Sandy
Sent: Saturday, October 23, 2010 10:23 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The Awakening

Tucson nodds and does as asked of him.

"Very well. I'm happy to see that all of you are showing the initiative to 
have faith in the unknown.  This will only strengthen our bonds and our 
forces.
He then turns his head toward the direction of Rodimus.

"I notice you're a tad quiet Rodimus, I understand if something is bothering 
you and I'm here to listen if you need to get a few things off your mind.  I 
realize that you have been through a lot, and most of it unpleasent.  I 
assure you Hydras will not get away with what he did to you and neither will 
the rest of his lackies."

A stone solid look of determination comes over Tucson's face.  Like Optimus 
he was not one to shy away from working toward a resolve.

" And if I must, if given the challenge, I will face him if he so choses, on 
a one to one basis.  He took something very valuable away from me, my 
comrades, and my friends.  And now, it's time I took something away from 
him."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
>
> > <OLD>
> >

> > primitive self"said Perceptor"She is who are in the most imediate 
> > risk...
> > ok"he said while he faced Staton and the others "I need your help... I 
> > need
> > you to be my eyes... this place isnt designed to allow me do my job I'll
> > tell you what to do and you will tell me what is going on with a wide
> > detaill, the most insignificant thing could be vital. Our firts step 
> > would
> > be delete both programs, the Predacon program is more agressive and
> > posessive and I foresee that it would be the most problematic... The 
> > MAximal
> > one may be corrupted or damaged... till her memories are restored and 
> > with
> > them her bonds with maximals we must be carefull cause she wont know if

> > are enemies or foes... in your case anyway cause I doubt that she would 
> > be
> > happy to see me. Start when you are ready..."
>
> Legacy and Santon began looking over Nightlight's form, checking for
> any last minute changes. They didn't seem to find any.
>
> Meanwhile Bump stepped into the middle of the conversation between
> Rodimus and Tuscon and the others. "We can begin the operation, but it
> is time for the rest of you to leave." Bump took a moment to run
> another scan of Tuscon and Rodimus, "Both of you will need time in a
> recharge chamber to be at full capacity, but you can do that any
> time."
>
> Bumps frowned, "But we need to clear this room for our next patients."
>
